txt.en: Warg-riders are located in northern Talath Anor.\n\nYou should defeat Warg-riders for the safety of Crithost.
Tolwin can be found in the hall of Crithost.\n\nYou should speak with Tolwin.
'Thank you. With your help, Crithost continues to be safe for these good people, myself included.'

'The look-out in Crithost's tower has spotted Warg-riding Orcs north of here. If you're heading towards Parth Lisc, perhaps you could defeat a few of these beasts. I fear for the safety of the town if they were to advance any closer.'
Tolwin is worried about Orkish Warg-riders patrolling the northern fields of Talath Anor and wishes for you to deal with this threat upon Crithost.
